column13: he was the son of the late elmer h. and fortunata (mazzone) lenzen. john was a self employed electrician for many years. he was a us navy veteran serving in the vietnam war. he is survived by two sons; john lenzen and anthony lenzen
column18: six great grandchildren and girlfriend cynthia patterson. a funeral service will be held on saturday
column20: 2015 at 9:00 am in the gorton-menard funeral home & crematory
column23: ri. calling hours will be held on friday
column25: 2015 from 4:00 to 7:00 pm. burial with military honors will be in the ri veterans cemetery
column27: ri. for online condolences please visit www. gortonmenardfuneralhome. com.
